hero.aboutText: Unity Technologies, in collaboration with Abu Dhabi Gaming and Abu Dhabi Heritage Authority, proudly presents the Heritage Gameathon, Abu Dhabi's largest game creation event dedicated to celebrating Emirati culture through interactive digital storytelling. Over three immersive days, participants will design and develop playable games inspired by the UAE's unique heritage, traditions and stories. Whether focusing on architecture, crafts, landscapes, folklore, music or values, creators will explore the UAE's culture in meaningful, authentic and innovative ways. The Heritage Gameathon serves as a pathway into future Abu Dhabi Gaming initiatives including mentorship programs and advanced training opportunities. The gameathon is a key step in developing the next generation of regional creators with the skills and experience to contribute to the global gaming industry. Participants are encouraged to draw on curated heritage references to ensure responsible, respectful and accurate cultural representation throughout their work.

prizes.title: What You Can Win
prizes.subtitle: Compete for generous cash prizes and exclusive opportunities
prizes.beyondDesc: Top-performing teams will gain exclusive access to specialized gaming development programs. Participants will also navigate advanced game design methodologies and industry tools, preparing them for future challenges in the global gaming industry.
prizes.beyondRich:
The Heritage Gameathon is a structured talent development platform. Participants will strengthen their skills in:

  • Game design and prototyping
  • Storytelling
  • Visual arts and animation
  • Coding and technical development
  • Teamwork

Throughout the event, creators will receive guidance from industry mentors and technical experts from Unity Technologies and Abu Dhabi Gaming, ensuring a supportive and high-quality development environment.

In addition to the game jam, participants can enjoy a variety of engaging activities during the event, including workshops and cultural experiences.

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Turath Gameathon
faqs.a1: It is a game development competition held within a fixed timeframe, where individuals and teams compete to present the best independent game idea based on a specific theme.
faqs.q2: Can I start working on my game before the event?
faqs.a2: No. All games must be created entirely during the official Game Jam period. However, you may use pre-made assets only if they are free or legally owned by your team.
faqs.q3: What is the theme of the Game Jam?
faqs.a3: The theme will be announced at the start of the event. All submissions must align with the official theme inspired by Emirati heritage and culture.
faqs.q4: How many people can be in a team?
faqs.a4: Teams can have up to 8 participants. If you register as an individual, the organizers will help match you with a team.
faqs.q5: Who owns the games created during the event?
faqs.a5: You retain full intellectual property ownership of your game. However, Abu Dhabi Gaming and the Abu Dhabi Heritage Authority reserve the right to use, showcase, publish, modify, or distribute submitted games and related materials for promotional, cultural, or educational purposes.
faqs.a6: Games must be submitted before the official deadline announced by the organizers during the event. Late submissions will not be accepted for judging.
faqs.q7: Where can I submit my game?
faqs.a7: All games must be submitted through our official Itch.io submission page.
faqs.q8: Are there content restrictions for the games?
faqs.a8:
Yes. Submissions must not include:
• Sexual content
• Excessive violence
• Discriminatory or hateful content
• Culturally inappropriate themes

Violations will lead to immediate disqualification.
faqs.q9: How will the games be judged?
faqs.a9:
Entries will be evaluated by the judging panel based on:
• Creativity & Innovation
• Cultural Relevance
• Gameplay & Mechanics
• Art Direction
• Overall Presentation
faqs.q10: What equipment do I need to bring?
faqs.a10:
Participants must bring their own:
• Laptop
• Chargers & adapters
• Required software or tools

The venue will provide internet access and power outlets.

rules.title: Heritage Gameathon Rules
rules.subtitle: Please read and understand all rules and requirements before participating in the Heritage Gameathon. These guidelines ensure a fair, respectful, and productive event for all participants.

originalWork.title: Original Work
originalWork.content: All games must be created entirely during the Game Jam period. Pre-made assets may be used only if they are free or legally owned by the team.

theme.title: Theme
theme.content: All submissions must align with the official theme inspired by Emirati heritage and culture, announced at the start of the event.

teamSize.title: Team Size
teamSize.content: Teams may consist of up to 8 participants. Individual participants will be matched with others if needed.

ownership.title: Ownership & Usage Rights
ownership.content: Games created during game jam remain the intellectual property of the creators. However, Abu Dhabi Gaming and the Abu Dhabi Heritage Authority reserve the full right to use, showcase, publish, modify, or distribute the games and related materials in any form for promotional, cultural, or educational purposes.

conduct.title: Code of Conduct
conduct.content: Participants are expected to maintain respectful and professional behaviour throughout the event. Any form of discrimination, harassment, or misconduct will result in disqualification.

deadline.title: Submission Deadline
deadline.content: Games must be submitted before the official deadline announced by the organizers. Late submissions will not be considered for judging.

restrictions.title: Content Restrictions
restrictions.content: Games containing sexual, violent, discriminatory, or culturally inappropriate content are strictly prohibited. Any game violating these guidelines will be immediately disqualified.

judging.title: Judging Criteria
judging.content: Entries will be evaluated based on creativity, cultural relevance, gameplay, art direction, and overall presentation.

equipment.title: Equipment & Tools
equipment.content: Participants must bring their own laptops, chargers, and necessary software. Internet access and power outlets will be provided at the venue.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: By participating in the Heritage Gameathon, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by all rules and guidelines outlined above. The organizers reserve the right to make final decisions on all matters related to the event.
